attributes.action: force through a lengthy or even lifetime ban on Sheffield United 'player' Chris Morgan for the deliberate attack on Iain Hume.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This so called tackle certainly seemed premeditated and if one was to do that to a fellow citizen in the street, you could be charged with attempted murder. Chris Morgan has not even received a single match ban and has not apologized to Iain Hume. Disgraceful.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Football Association
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
